description.en: Sierra Encantada is Morelos' first certified goat farm producing artisanal organic cheeses, awarded Super Gold at the World Cheese Awards.
description.fr: Sierra Encantada is Morelos' first certified goat farm producing artisanal organic cheeses, awarded Super Gold at the World Cheese Awards.
